How You Can Help With Mozilla

04 Aug 1999

The folks over at Mozilla.org have written up a nice little document about how those of you that aren't C/C++ gurus can help out the project.

\nBasically, anyone that can report and check bugs can help out the cause, and make a standards compliant browser that much closer to reality! Head on over and see how you can help.
